# 의뢰인정보
###  테스트1 {.tabset}

```{python}
import plotly.express as px
import pandas as pd

# 데이터 로드
penguins = pd.read_csv('data/penguins.csv')

from itables import show
show(penguins, buttons = ['copy', 'excel', 'pdf'])


```

::: {.card title="My Title"}
카드안에 ㄷ들어있는 텍스트입니다.
![팔머펭귄](penguins.png)
:::


## Row {height=70%}

```{python}
import plotly.express as px
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np


penguins = pd.read_csv('data/penguins.csv')
penguins.head()

fig = px.scatter(
    penguins,
    x="bill_length_mm",
    y="bill_depth_mm",
    color="species",
    size_max=30,
    
)

fig.update_layout(
    title=dict(
        text="<span style='color:blue;font-weight:bold;'>팔머펭귄</span>",  # HTML 태그를 문자열로 처리
        x=0.5, 
        xanchor='center',
        yanchor='top'
    )
)
```
